title: DDFP 575: Best of Events: Rams Camp, Pie-Off, Shekys, DDFP 500 & SB LI
itunes:title: DDFP 575: Best of Events: Rams Camp, Pie-Off, Shekys, DDFP 500 & SB LI
description:
Relive some of the greatest moments from the DDFP's "Special Events" shows of the past year, beginning with Dave Dameshek's visit to L.A. Rams training camp all the way through our Super Bowl LI show from Houston, Texas. Shek also revisits our celebration of the show's 500th episode, the exciting conclusion of Pie-Off V and the annual honoring of "Best Non-Football-Playing Guest" and "Best Fruit" at the 2016 Sheky Awards.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
